          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Elegir la voz de diccionario correcta dada una definición</string>
            <string language="en">Choosing the right word in the dictionary for a given definition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wählen des rechten Wortes im Verzeichnis für 
eine gegebene Definition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choix du bon mot dans le dictionnaire pour une 
définition donnée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escolhendo a palavra direita no dicionário para 
uma definição dada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scelta della parola giusta nel dizionario per una
data definizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή της σωστής λέξης στο λεξικό για έναν 
δεδομένο καθορισμό</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Elegir la palabra que buscarías en el diccionario para encontrar la definición de unas expresiones formadas por varios vocablos.</string>
            <string language="en">Choosing the word you would look up in a dictionary to find the definition of expressions formed by several words.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Diccionario</string>
            <string language="en">Dictionary</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Wort wählend, würden Sie oben in einem 
Verzeichnis schauen, um die Definition der Ausdrücke zu finden, die 
durch einige Wörter gebildet wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choisissant le mot vous rechercheriez dans un 
dictionnaire pour trouver la définition des expressions constituées 
par plusieurs mots.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escolhendo a palavra você olharia acima em um 
dicionário para encontrar a definição das expressões dadas forma 
por diversas palavras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scegliendo la parola osservereste in su in un 
dizionario per trovare la definizione delle espressioni costituite da 
parecchie parole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλέγοντας τη λέξη θα ανατρέχατε σε ένα λεξικό για 
να βρείτε τον καθορισμό των εκφράσεων που διαμορφώνονται από 
διάφορες λέξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verzeichnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dictionnaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεξικό</string>
          </keyword>
